data.name: Wolfenstein: Enemy Territory
data.detailed_description: Wolfenstein®: Enemy Territory is a free-to-play, objective-based multiplayer World War 2 first-person shooter. Featuring up to 32 players, choose either the Axis or Allies, as you fight across six maps based on real-world battle locations. Play as one of five unique classes (Engineer, Medic, Soldier, Field Ops, and Covert Ops) as you work with your team to complete key objectives necessary for victory.
data.about_the_game: Wolfenstein®: Enemy Territory is a free-to-play, objective-based multiplayer World War 2 first-person shooter. Featuring up to 32 players, choose either the Axis or Allies, as you fight across six maps based on real-world battle locations. Play as one of five unique classes (Engineer, Medic, Soldier, Field Ops, and Covert Ops) as you work with your team to complete key objectives necessary for victory.
data.short_description: Wolfenstein®: Enemy Territory is a free-to-play, objective-based multiplayer World War 2 first-person shooter. Featuring up to 32 players, choose either the Axis or Allies, as you fight across six maps based on real-world battle locations.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: English version of Windows® 98/ME/NT4.0 (SP6)/2000/XP operating system (Windows NT 4.0 not recommended for clients)
  • Processor: Pentium III® 600MHz processor or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 3D hardware accelerator with 32 MB with full OpenGL® support
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
